attributes.additional_details: Judge Gillian Matthews freed a sex offender who accused a seven-year-old victim of “coming on to him”. She recently let a man to walk free after he bit off 3cm of another man’s tongue following a dispute. Our country needs judges who will stand up to thugs and pedophiles. We do not need a justice system that is weak and run by incompetent jelly-backs who are turning this country into a criminal’s playground. We ask that Judge Gillian Matthews to be sacked.  This will also send a strong message to other judges who show leniency towards criminals who put us and our children at risk
